modName: The Elder Plams V - By RandomAxe Main Theme Replacer
summary: Replaces the main theme music with RandomAxe's "Elder Plams V"
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the main theme music with RandomAxe's "Elder Plams V" . I hope people who are fans or not will enjoy this fun and different theme replacement. I do NOT take credit for making this, it was all made by RandomAxe - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCa5kN4H_0mwmPy0HlAveXiw

The original video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NjxdLJgOYyQ


To Install:

Extract the folder from the compressed file into your Skyrim/Data folder

WILL conflict with any other theme re placers as expected.

First mod just uploaded when the idea came into my head, might be uploading more i don't know yet.
author: xiiskylordz
